htmlBody: I think the difficulty with going to a data science bootcamp without a science PHD or partial PHD is that you are then entering a job market competing with other bootcamp graduates who do have a PHD as an additional qualification. If you have already impressive other qualifications thats probably fine but otherwise you seem at a non-trivial disadvantage all other things being equal
Thank you for the feedback! We'll take these points into account when we next update the profiles.
Hopefully we'll have comments available on the career profiles soon so you'll be able to drop your thoughts on there. :)
